author: Josh
title: Solana Targets $300 & ADA Jumps 10% - Why Not Earn Unlimited USDT Cashback? Hop into BlockDAG's Refer & Earn Program!
text:
The crypto arena remains a hotbed of activity, with the Cardano (ADA) price soaring by 10% within a day, injecting new energy into its market presence. Concurrently, the outlook for Solana suggests a formidable climb, with analysts forecasting a rally towards $300 amid robust foundational support and a swell in market enthusiasm.
Moreover, the interesting Refer & Earn USDT initiative from the BlockDAG (BDAG) Network is drawing considerable interest. This program rewards traders with up to 10% USDT cashback on each trade, with absolutely no daily caps. As both Cardano and Solana carve their paths in the market, BlockDAG’s $178 million presale achievement and compelling incentives mark it as a top crypto to buy now.
Cardano Price Rises 10%, Sparks Market Excitement The Cardano (ADA) price has leapt 10% in just 24 hours to hit $0.9345, revitalizing trader interest. This increase boosts ADA’s market valuation to $32.26 billion, accounting for nearly 1% of the global crypto market. Its trading volume has also surged, reaching $682.71 million as the Cardano (ADA) price oscillated between $0.8383 and $0.9349.
Solana Predictions Eye a Surge to $330 Solana’s prospects look bright, hinting at significant gains ahead. A notable post by @TheMoonCarl on X states, “SOL stays above crucial support. If Solana rebounds here, it could soar to $330.” With $1 billion in stablecoin injections last month, Solana’s total value locked (TVL) has sextupled in 2024, boosting confidence in its market potential.
Solana’s rapid transaction capabilities and low fees continue to attract retail traders and decentralized finance initiatives. Analysts believe surpassing key resistance levels might catapult SOL to unprecedented highs. The buzz around Solana predictions, coupled with its traction in DeFi and meme tokens, primes it for its next significant leap.
Unlock Limitless USDT Cashback with BlockDAG BlockDAG’s interesting Refer & Earn USDT initiative is revolutionizing the way traders receive rewards. Each day, the program gives a 6% cashback in USDT (BEP-20) on the first transaction made through a referral link.
As more purchases are made via a single referral within one day, the cashback percentage increases. The cashback begins at 6% for the initial transaction and increments to 7% for the second, 8% for the third, and 9% for the fourth. After the fourth transaction, a steady 10% cashback is awarded for each subsequent transaction. Those using a referral code also enjoy a consistent 6% cashback on their transactions, maximizing benefits for both parties.
To qualify, each transaction must exceed $30, and there’s no daily limit to what can be earned. The program resets daily at 00:00 UTC, allowing traders to maximize their potential earnings each day.
This initiative has captured significant attention during BlockDAG’s crypto presale, which has successfully raised over $178 million and sold more than 17.7 billion coins. Currently, in its 27th presale batch, the BDAG coin’s price has soared to $0.0248, marking a staggering 2,380% increase from its first batch price of $0.001.
As BlockDAG approaches a $600 million funding target, its appealing mix of accessible and profitable rewards continues to attract traders. Its robust referral system has helped grow its community to over 170,000 holders and provides substantial returns, positioning it as the top crypto to buy now for impressive gains this year.
2025’s Prime Crypto Choices Unveiled As we step into 2025, the crypto domain is buzzing with dynamic shifts. The Cardano (ADA) price has recently spiked by 10% in just one day, igniting discussions about its potential to revisit and surpass previous peaks. Meanwhile, Solana predictions are generating excitement, with market experts projecting a possible rise to $300, spurred by an expanding network and vigorous trading dynamics.
At the same time, BlockDAG continues to offer compelling prospects with its Refer & Earn USDT scheme, which promises unlimited daily cashbacks ranging from 6% to 10%. Nearing its $600 million presale target, BlockDAG solidifies its position as a top crypto to buy , attracting those in search of substantial rewards and sustained growth opportunities.
